pageProduct.name: Remifemin Sleep 30 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Sleep by Remifemin" is a combination of three herbs of Valerian, Hops and Lemon Balm that have been used traditionally to help people who suffer from nervous restlessness (daytime) or insomnia/poor sleep quality (night time). It may help to:
Promote calm and restfulness
Support the onset of sleep and healthy sleep quality
Allow you to wake refreshed with no daytime sleepiness.

Warnings

Always read the label. Use only as directed. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.
Do not use the product if the blister foil is broken.
Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Promote calm and restfulness
Support the onset of sleep and healthy sleep quality
Allow you to wake refreshed with no daytime sleepiness.

Ingredients

Each tablet contains extracts equivalent to dried:
Valerian (Valeriana officinalis) 412.5mg
Common Hops (Humulus lupulus) 138mg
Lemon Balm (Melissa officinalis) 225mg

Directions

Recommended dosage: Take 2 tablets half an hour to an hour before
going to bed. In extreme cases of sleeplessness (especially when
caused by anxiety) take 2 tablets 2-3 times per day.
